decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Non-Material Amendment(s):
1. Various internal alterations
2. Adjustments to the design, size and siting of the proposed rear dormer.
3. Alterations to pitches to the corners of the roof, with these being straightened out. 
4. The addition of a new first floor side window.
5. Alterations to the design of ground floor side windows and the side access door, all of the windows would be smaller.
6. Alterations in the design of the dwellinghouse�s main front access door.
7. Alterations to the positioning of some roof lights.
8. The incorporation of projecting roof lights that would protrude beyond the plane of their respective roof slopes.
9. Alterations to the design of the canopy to the front of the dwellinghouse.
10. An increase in the floor area of the study within the loft by having this extend into the roof void accommodated within the dwellinghouse�s front gable projection. 
11. The addition of barge boards and alterations to the detailing to the front of the dwellinghouse�s front gable projection.
12. The incorporation of downpipes towards the front and rear of the property.
13. Alterations to access steps to the rear of the patio.
14. Alterations to balustrade railings to the patio.

Reason : 1 - Within the context of the planning permission P/1783/21 dated 26/07/2021, the proposed development would be significantly different in its design, and would introduce various new elements of development, and result in alterations to the overall massing of the dwellinghouse. The alterations as a whole would result in a material change to the character and appearance of the host dwelling, street scene and wider area, and would also result in a material change in impact on the residential amenities of adjacent neighbours. It would therefore require re-consultation of neighbouring properties, and the proposal would need to be re-assessed against the requirements of Policy D3 of The London Plan (2021) and Policy DM1 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010). The proposal is therefore not considered to be non-material minor amendment.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission P/1783/21 Dated 27/07/2021 To Allow internal alterations, the installation of new roof lights and alterations to the positioning and design of other roof lights, the provision of a rear terraces at first floor and roof levels, alterations to the roof forms of first floor rear extensions, alterations to front side and rear fenestration, the insertion of a new first floor side window, the removal of the canopy to the front entrance of the building, alterations to the design of the proposed rear dormer, alterations to the proposed rear patio, the provision of external lamps, and the incorporation of downpipes to the front and rear elevations of the dwellinghouse
